A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Visually\, the movie is absolutely gorgeous\, but unfortunately it feels bloated and re-established characters don't act the way they did before. Do not expect any answers to questions you had from The Force Awakens. Don't get me wrong\, its fun\, but its so dense with new mythology that it took me a while to really process it. 

Pros: 
- Great Cinematography 
- Luke/Leia 
- Great fight scenes

Cons:
- No character payoff
- Bloated and too dense
- Cool concepts wasted
- Longest space chase sequence in history
